hedline.hl1: ALTAVISTA TO SELL ITS OWN ADS

abstract.p: AltaVista says it will take over sales of advertising on its site in US from DoubleClick; used to be DoubleClick's largest customer (S)

block.p: AltaVista said yesterday that it would take over sales of advertising on its site in the United States from DoubleClick. AltaVista, which used to be DoubleClick's largest customer, began selling ads itself last year to customers in the United States and now sells them on about 800 Web sites that also advertise on AltaVista.com. DoubleClick shares fell $3.8125, or 9.9 percent, to $34.8125.
